# calcite-tip-group

`calcite-tip-group` is a wrapper for multiple `calcite-tip`s and is housed in `calcite-tip-manager`.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                              | Type     | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `groupTitle` | `group-title` | The component header text for all nested `calcite-tip`s. | `string` | `undefined` |

## Slots

| Slot | Description                       |
| ---- | --------------------------------- |
|      | A slot for adding `calcite-tip`s. |
